doc.field: Subseries III.D contains records of Dr. Marjorie Snyder, who has worked for and with the WSF in various capacities from 1987. Records include correspondence, publicity and marketing materials, PSAs (public service announcements), program proposals and files, calendars, publications, event programs, and a file of WSF publications, including scholarship guides, research reports, and educational pamphlets. Records date from 1988-2007.

Dr. Marjorie Snyder had previously held various positions at the WSF, including Chief Program & Planning Officer, Senior Director of Research & Programs, and Interim co-CEO on two occasions. While serving the WSF, Dr. Snyder directed the advocacy, education, research and planning efforts of the Foundation, co-authored research reports, developed the GoGirlGo! Project, and served as Foundation spokesperson and speaker at national and international conferences. Dr. Snyder is also largely credited with collecting and maintaining the archival records of the WSF within their offices. As of 2021, Dr. Snyder is the Senior Research Advisor at the WSF.
Series III. Staff records >> Subseries III.D. Marjorie Snyder records
